name: Triple Word Match
description:
Triple Word Match is a fun, challenging and addicting game with 7500 words. Hours of fun game play!


"A great three-column word matching game. Requires some thinking outside the box--that's a good thing. For example, relationship between first and second words may not be the same as relationship between second and third." - By Carol Blank


FEATURES

- 250 levels, 7500 words
- Fun and addicting word game
- Easy to use
- Clean interface
- Synonyms, antonyms and free word associations
- Dictionary look-up though use of long-click on completed word pairs


The game is simple to play. You match associated words on the board. To complete a level you must match every word with its associated pairs. Triple Word Match has a mixture of simple and advanced vocabulary words. Long-click on completed word match to get dictionary definitions. Perfect for anyone who enjoys word games!
